sentences: Romaani epiloog tutvustab tegelaste edasist saatust.
Draama l천peb epilogiga, mis annab kokkuv천tte ja n채itab tegelaste saatusi.
Ooperis on tihti eraldi epiloog, mis selgitab kuidas asjad edasi l채ksid.
context: In Estonian, 'saatust' is the partitive form of 'saatus' (fate/destiny), but in this context it appears to be related to literature and drama as a component of 'epiloog'. The word refers to the concluding section of a literary work or dramatic piece that provides a summary and shows what happens to the characters later - their fate or destiny. It's essentially an epilogue that reveals the ultimate fate or destiny of the characters after the main story concludes.
